generated_issues.issue_title: Implement Slack command center for Alpha Machine ticket management
generated_issues.issue_description:
Develop the Slack command center to issue commands for ticket creation, retrieval, and status updates for Alpha Machine. This includes integrating Slack commands to create structured Linear tickets from meeting transcripts, retrieve project status, and manage tickets efficiently.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Slack commands implemented for ticket creation, retrieval, and updates
- Integration with Linear API to create and update tickets
- Commands tested and documented
- User feedback loop enabled for ticket refinement
subissues: Integrate Slack commands with Linear API
Implement ticket retrieval and status commands

generated_issues.issue_title: Archive meeting transcripts in Supabase for Alpha Machine
generated_issues.issue_description:
Implement functionality to archive meeting transcripts into Supabase as configuration documents for internal company use. This will support the Alpha Machine's ability to analyze and generate tickets from transcripts.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Meeting transcripts are stored securely in Supabase
- Transcripts are indexed and retrievable for AI processing
- Integration tested with ticket generation pipeline
subissues: Set up Supabase storage schema for transcripts
Test transcript retrieval for AI processing

generated_issues.issue_title: Develop AI model for unbiased ticket scouting and structuring
generated_issues.issue_description:
Develop and train the AI model to automatically scout tasks from meeting transcripts and structure them into Linear tickets with fields such as team, project, milestone, issue title, description, and time estimate.

Acceptance Criteria:
- AI model can parse transcripts and identify actionable tasks
- Tickets generated include structured fields with estimated effort
- Human feedback loop incorporated to improve model accuracy
subissues: Train initial model on sample transcripts
Test model accuracy and improve iteratively

generated_issues.issue_title: Integrate Notion bot for auto-populating consulting workflow components
generated_issues.issue_description:
Develop a Notion bot that auto-populates consulting workflow components such as client uptake workflows, competitor analysis, and project status digests based on meeting transcripts and ticket data.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Notion bot can create and update relevant pages and tables
- Integration with Slack and Linear data sources
- Auto-digest feature for project status updates
- Tested and documented for internal use
subissues: Implement data extraction from Slack and Linear

generated_issues.issue_title: Build chatbot with proactive conversation guidance and dual reviewer agents
generated_issues.issue_description:
Develop a chatbot for Affirm Health that helps users complete forms by proactively guiding conversations. Implement two reviewer agents that evaluate each chatbot response before sending it to the user, providing feedback and approval.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Chatbot can guide users through form completion
- Reviewer agents evaluate and approve or reject responses
- JSON structure for communication defined and implemented
- Chatbot tested and ready for Wednesday release
subissues: Define and implement JSON communication structure

generated_issues.issue_title: Schedule meeting with Adam to obtain email forwarding feedback and access
generated_issues.issue_description:
Coordinate and schedule a meeting with Adam to review and obtain necessary feedback on email forwarding and access to his Superbase data to unblock ongoing development.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Meeting scheduled and conducted with Adam
- Feedback and access requirements documented
- Plan created to proceed based on meeting outcomes
subissues: Prepare agenda for email forwarding and access
Plan next steps based on feedback

generated_issues.issue_title: Make chatbot resizable and implement font update for Masimo
generated_issues.issue_description:
Enhance the Vitality chatbot UI to be resizable by users (adjust height and width). Update the chatbot font to Sensorif Semi Bold as requested by Masimo.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Chatbot UI supports resizing in all directions
- Font updated to Sensorif Semi Bold
- Changes tested on deployed site
- Document UI changes
subissues: Update font to Sensorif Semi Bold
Test UI changes on client site

generated_issues.issue_title: Investigate and reduce chatbot response latency on client site
generated_issues.issue_description:
Investigate the cause of long response times for the Vitality chatbot on the client site and implement fixes to reduce latency.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Identify bottlenecks causing latency
- Implement fixes to improve response time
- Validate improvements with client testing
- Document findings and solutions

generated_issues.issue_title: Add export functionality for chatbot data to .doc format
generated_issues.issue_description:
Implement export feature for Vitality chatbot data to allow users to export conversation or report data in .doc file format as requested by the client.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Export to .doc format implemented
- Export tested for accuracy and formatting
- Feature documented for users
